alert.note: Alert for Greene (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN GREENE... NORTHWESTERN MONONGALIA...NORTHEASTERN WETZEL AND NORTHWESTERN MARION COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hundred, or 9 miles northwest of Mannington, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Hundred, Blacksville, New Freeport, Burton, Wana, Brave, Metz, Earnshaw, Knob Fork, Wadestown, and Daybrook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southwestern Pennsylvania...and northern West Virginia.
